channel.title: [508] How To Change Your Client Name
channel.description:
[size=30pt]Please post comments or do the poll, this will help me improve on what you think![/size]
This is for 508 client's, so if your looking on how to change a 317 client name, no point in carrying on reading. So, go into files > Applet_Sub1 and go onto CTRL + F and search for whatever the clients called. Then just change that to what you want your client to be named, maybe to your server name and re-upload! Pretty simple.
Hope this helped, I am not to sure on the IP Changer Client though.. If you can, download the berky-scape client, which should be on the Berky-Scape Source topic on Server Downloads and change that name instead.
